verses.verse: Arise, <S%H6965><s%> shine; <S%H215><s%> for your light <S%H216><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is risen <S%H2224><s%> on you.

For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and gross <S%H6205><s%> darkness <S%H6205><s%> the people: <S%H3816><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall arise <S%H2224><s%> on you, and his glory <S%H3519><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> on you.
And the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H1980><s%> to your light, <S%H216><s%> and kings <S%H4428><s%> to the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of your rising. <S%H2225><s%>

Lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, and see: <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they gather <S%H6908><s%> themselves together, they come <S%H935><s%> to you: your sons <S%H1121><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> from far, <S%H7350><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be nursed <S%H539><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> your side. <S%H6654><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> you shall see, <S%H3372><s%> <S%H7200><s%> and flow <S%H5102><s%> together, and your heart <S%H3824><s%> shall fear, <S%H6342><s%> and be enlarged; <S%H7337><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be converted <S%H2015><s%> to you, the forces <S%H2428><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to you.

The multitude <S%H8229><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> you, the dromedaries <S%H1070><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> and Ephah; <S%H5891><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they from Sheba <S%H7614><s%> shall come: <S%H935><s%> they shall bring <S%H5375><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and incense; <S%H3828><s%> and they shall show <S%H1319><s%> forth the praises <S%H8416><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908><s%> together to you, the rams <S%H352><s%> of Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> to you: they shall come <S%H5927><s%> up with acceptance <S%H7522><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my altar, <S%H4196><s%> and I will glorify <S%H6286><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of my glory. <S%H8597><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> that fly <S%H5774><s%> as a cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and as the doves <S%H3123><s%> to their windows? <S%H699><s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H6960><s%> for me, and the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> from far, <S%H7350><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> with them, to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and to the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has glorified <S%H6286><s%> you.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of strangers <S%H5236><s%> shall build <S%H1129><s%> up your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> to you: for in my wrath <S%H7110><s%> I smote <S%H5221><s%> you, but in my favor <S%H7522><s%> have I had mercy <S%H7355><s%> on you.

Therefore your gates <S%H8179><s%> shall be open <S%H6605><s%> continually; <S%H8548><s%> they shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> nor night; <S%H3915><s%> that men may bring <S%H935><s%> to you the forces <S%H2428><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> and that their kings <S%H4428><s%> may be brought. <S%H5090><s%>
For the nation <S%H1471><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> that will not serve <S%H5647><s%> you shall perish; <S%H6><s%> yes, those nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be utterly wasted. <S%H2717><s%>

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to you, the fir <S%H1265><s%> tree, the pine <S%H8410><s%> tree, and the box <S%H8391><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> to beautify <S%H6286><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of my sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of my feet <S%H7272><s%> glorious. <S%H3513><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of them that afflicted <S%H6031><s%> you shall come <S%H1980><s%> bending <S%H7817><s%> to you; and all <S%H3605><s%> they that despised <S%H5006><s%> you shall bow <S%H7812><s%> themselves down <S%H7812><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet; <S%H7272><s%> and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> you; The city <S%H5892><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The Zion <S%H6726><s%> of the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Whereas <S%H8478><s%> you has been <S%H1961><s%> forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and hated, <S%H8130><s%> so that no <S%H369><s%> man went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> you, I will make <S%H7760><s%> you an eternal <S%H5769><s%> excellency, <S%H1347><s%> a joy <S%H4885><s%> of many generations. <S%H1755><s%>

You shall also suck <S%H3243><s%> the milk <S%H2461><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%H1471><s%> and shall suck <S%H3243><s%> the breast <S%H7699><s%> of kings: <S%H4428><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> am your Savior <S%H3467><s%> and your Redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> the mighty <S%H46><s%> One of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

For brass <S%H5178><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and for iron <S%H1270><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and for wood <S%H6086><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and for stones <S%H68><s%> iron: <S%H1270><s%> I will also make <S%H7760><s%> your officers <S%H6486><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and your exactors <S%H5065><s%> righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be heard <S%H8085><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> wasting <S%H7701><s%> nor destruction <S%H7667><s%> within your borders; <S%H1366><s%> but you shall call <S%H7121><s%> your walls <S%H2346><s%> Salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and your gates <S%H8179><s%> Praise. <S%H8416><s%>

The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> your light <S%H216><s%> by day; <S%H3119><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> for brightness <S%H5051><s%> shall the moon <S%H3394><s%> give light <S%H216><s%> to you: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be to you an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and your God <S%H430><s%> your glory. <S%H8597><s%>

Your sun <S%H8121><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> go <S%H935><s%> down; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall your moon <S%H3391><s%> withdraw <S%H622><s%> itself: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be your everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your mourning <S%H60><s%> shall be ended. <S%H7999><s%>

Your people <S%H5971><s%> also shall be all <S%H3605><s%> righteous: <S%H6662><s%> they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> the branch <S%H5342><s%> of my planting, <S%H4302><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> that I may be glorified. <S%H6286><s%>

A little <S%H6996><s%> one shall become <S%H1961><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and a small <S%H6810><s%> one a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will hasten <S%H2363><s%> it in his time. <S%H6256><s%>
